author: Marc Davis
title: On the Sidelines- October 16
text:
On the Sidelines- October 16 - NBC12 - WWBT - Richmond, VA News On Your Side Member Center: On the Sidelines- October 16 Posted: 
Here are area high school football scores from Friday, October 16: 
Hermitage 44, Manchester 31 
Highland Springs 42, Lee-Davis 0 
Henrico 34, Atlee 20 
L.C. Bird 34, Cosby 6 
Meadowbrook 21, Matoaca 14 
Douglas Freeman 45, J.R. Tucker 15 
Mills Godwin 26, Deep Run 22 
James River 48, Midlothian 16 
Monacan 60, George Wythe 6

October 16th On the Sidelines- Part 1 Hermitage topped Manchester in our Game of the Week, Highland Springs and Hanover tallied lopsided wins, while Henrico fought off Atlee for a key late-season victory. More >> Hermitage topped Manchester in our Game of the Week, Highland Springs and Hanover tallied lopsided wins, while Henrico fought off Atlee for a key late-season victory. More >> October 16th On the Sidelines- Part 2 L.C. Bird moved to 7-0, while Meadowbrook snapped Matoaca's five game winning streak. Douglas Freeman, Monacan and James River rolled, while Mills Godwin nipped rival Deep Run. More >> L.C. Bird moved to 7-0, while Meadowbrook snapped Matoaca's five game winning streak. Douglas Freeman, Monacan and James River rolled, while Mills Godwin nipped rival Deep Run.
